string.text: To get shut down the Generators we need to find the security override codes. It's worth trying to search for them on old PCs - though I might will have to power them somehow.
Well, I was right: I must power the found PC somehow. There's a powerline in this room, so the only thing left is finding an energy source.
I heard the call of the Monolith. He called me to him. Now I ought to go to him and get the answers to all my questions.
Alright, the PC seems to work; now I need to search for the file containing the codes, then download it to my PDA.
The codes are obtained! Now it's time to get the hell out of here and head towards the Generators: Ghost should already be waiting for me at those parts. So is the Zone about to evaporate?..

It's probably my last note. Not sure how many days I spent in this cage, but my supplies are running low. I noticed when I woke up there were these yellow eyes staring at me and I heard deep breathing. The breathing happened about every hour near the cell and then I heard some scary scratching noise... I fear to even be released, if I do, the Zone would surely take me... But I need to try because staying here forever is worse. Brother, forgive me, I knew it was a bad idea to take part in this expedition to the center of the Zone. All our military escorts are dead, it was bad luck that I managed to find this place. The things I saw there, their nature, I can't explain it. These genetic mutations are impossible! The artifacts and anomalies simply don't compare with Einstein's gravitational field interactions and any of our current photon theories. I could write much more, but I need to try to leave this place. If I can't get out of this alive, take care of our mother please, I love you both.

Do you think "Generators" were created just to power supply for human minds control mechanism? It's much bigger: they wanted to play God and succeeded in it. I'm not sure who is running all this we've been told very clearly: we should finish the job quickly or there will be consequences. I constantly see some strange people near my home, near my family... I need to focus on the work because if something happens to them - I won't be able to live with it!\n\nHere's everything I could find on them: faces, names, witnesses... but it's not enough. They are using secret headquarters to perform their operations here, in Chernobyl, - but the KGB is ordered to keep away from them. I just hope this won't last long and it's possible to get away eventually...
